term.title: anisotropy

item.text: The property of molecules and materials to exhibit variations in physical properties along different molecular axes of the substance.

sources.item: PAC, 1997, 69, 1251. 'Glossary of terms used in bioinorganic chemistry (IUPAC Recommendations 1997)' on page 1257 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199769061251)
